channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Potholes, 19th March
item.description:
The whole of this road from A38 to elmstone hardwick is a disgrace. Massive potholes it’s dangerous for cars and cycles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Cursey Lane, Elmstone Hardwicke
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large, deep pothole on Oxford Walk, 19th March
item.description:
It has clearly been here for some time

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1b Oxford Street, Cheltenham

item.title: Litter, 19th March
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Gloucester Business Park Golf Club Lane, Brockworth

item.title: Street light not working, 19th March
item.description:
Street light not working, needs to be fixed, been like this for a while now.

item.title: Sapphire Way to Gauntlet Road, 19th March
item.description:
Whole section of road needs tarmac put down - looks like it was never finished & forgotten following completion of devlopment.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 50 Gauntlet Road, Abbeymead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pavement slab that has lifted outside River Island, 19th March
item.description:
My friend was walking past River Island and tripped on a raised loose paving stone. She fell and has broken a bone in each of her hands , has very severely bruised ribs and a badly grazed knee. This pavement is just one example of many in the town which are a real hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 151 High Street, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of potholes of varying sizes, 19th March
item.description:
These potholes have been here for a while and getting worse
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 87 Saint Georges Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sequence of potholes, 19th March
item.description:
There's a whole lot of potholes along this stretch of road. PLEASE don't just fill them individually - RESURFACE the road properly
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Government Offices Parabola Road, Cheltenham

item.description:

item.title: Pothole on junction of Chepstow Way and Farmington Road, 18th March
item.description:
Pothole has been there for some time but is now very deep.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Chedworth Way, Cheltenham

item.title: Roadwork notice in wrong place, 18th March
item.description:
The sign saying there will be roadworks on 22nd March 2021 is in the wrong place. It isIn the middle of Greenhills Road in Charlton Kings, but it needs to be at the Pilley Bridge roundabout , Charlton Lane so that people know they can’t get through at the end of that road. At the moment if they see the sign where it is they will have to do a three point turn in the middle of the road to be able to get out again. This is totally wrong and needs sorting out before the road works commence on the 22nd
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 111 Charlton Lane, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Really bad pothole!, 18th March
item.description:
There's a REALLY BAD pothole here in the left hand lane on the M5 between the bridge and the junction. Made a very loud bang when driven over and I had to pull over and check my wheels were ok. I'm disgusted to see the complete lack of care from Highways England because this exact pothole was reported OVER A MONTH AGO and still hasn't been fixed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): M5, Hucclecote
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 2 potholes outside 1 Lipson road., 18th March
item.description:
Busses go past every half an hour and my whole house shakes! Cracks now appearing in my walls and ceilings!! Reported already about 3 weeks ago. Please hurry!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 1 Lipson Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
